amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the the National Park Service by $100 million and reduce funding for the Environmental Protection Agency by $163 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds by $100,000,000 for the operation of the National Park System. And, reduce funds for the EPA by $163,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 274 (Roll no. 551).
